title: Halloween Spooktacular
description: Halter-Neck Maxi Dress: A sleek black gown with a high slit and striking crimson rose accents.
Lace Masquerade Mask: Intricate black lace for an air of mystery and classic glamour.
Lace Fingerless Gloves: A delicate, gothic detail that completes the vamp aesthetic.
Dangling Lariat Necklace: A long, slender pendant that draws the eye to the neckline.
Ruby Heart Earrings: Subtle sparkle and a splash of blood-red color for drama.
Pointed Toe Stiletto Heels: Classic black pumps for a sharp, polished finish.
Vampy Lip: A dramatic dark red lip for a fierce beauty statement.
flatlayAlt: Flat lay of halloween spooktacular outfit
modelAlt: Model wearing the halloween spooktacular outfit styled from the flat lay
